narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Lauryn Davidson is a Speech-Language Pathologist,   provider based in Aledo, TX. From 2023-05 through 2024-12, this provider received $166K in Medicaid payments across 2K claims serving 323 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: Bills 1.9× the national median for 92507 (92507), at $93 per claim vs. the median of $49, placing them above the 90th percentile.
100% of billing is concentrated in 92507 (92507), indicating significant specialization in this service.
